Convert a teapot into a mini greenhouse by drilling a small hole in the lid and placing a small seedling inside. The lid can be used to control temperature and humidity, and the spout can be used to water the plant.
A teapot can be repurposed as a candle holder by attaching a tea light candle to the lid and placing the spout on a flat surface. The handle can be used to hold the candle steady.
Use a teapot as a makeshift vase by attaching a small bouquet of flowers to the lid and placing the spout on a flat surface. The handle can be used to hold the vase steady.
A teapot can be used as a conversation starter by decorating it with paint, markers, or decals to create a unique piece of art.
Transform a teapot into a desk organizer by drilling small holes in the spout and handle to hold pens, pencils, or other small items.
